casebody.data:
Raymond C. ELLINGTON, Sunida Rodriguez, Gregorio Rodriguez, Sunirliza Rodriguez and Franklin Cruz, Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
CURE AUTO INSURANCE a/k/a Citizens United Reciprocal Exchange, Defendant-Movant. M-618 September Term 2017
079922 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 26, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to appeal is denied.
